subject: [OT] Eclipse plugin
msgSnippet: I have been combing through Eclipse docs and configuration files, etc. but to no avail.  Does anyone out there know how to add a context menu item to an active
messageBody:
I have been combing through Eclipse docs and configuration files, etc.
but to no avail. Does anyone out there know how to add a context menu
item to an active editor or perspective selection? I would like to save
myself the trouble of having to open an editor on a class just to be
able to run it as a JUnit test. Conceivably one can edit one of the
millions :) of XML configuration files to add a context menu entry on
the currently selected class. Any help would be appreciated, either the
answer to the question or a pointer to a document describing how to do
it.

Thanks.
=jason
